SCPM interface description

0.8

This document describe the application programming interface of SCPM. If you want to write an application that is profile management aware you only need to include scpm.h and access the public methods of the class SCPM. You also need to link libscpm.so, of course.

Index

  • SCPM SCPM class description
  • scpm_types.h global variables and types
SCPM interface description - 2002 SuSE Linux AG
